articles.title: Aurora borealis thrills stargazers in Scotland and North America - Daily Mail
articles.description: New photos from the public show the natural light display in green and pink hues over Loch Lomond near Glasgow in Scotland and in rural Canada and North Dakota.
articles.content:
A spectacular aurora borealis triggered by giant 'cannibal' solar eruption that hurtled towards Earth at 1.8 million miles an hour has thrilled stargazers in Scotland and North America.
